name: macfuse

conflicts.name: platform=linux
conflicts.description: macfuse does not support linux, use libfuse instead

conflicts.name: platform=cray
conflicts.description: macfuse does not support cray, use libfuse instead

description: FUSE for macOS allows you to extend macOS via third party file systems.

dependent_to.name: fuse-overlayfs
dependent_to.description: An implementation of overlay+shiftfs in FUSE for rootless containers.

dependent_to.name: squashfuse
dependent_to.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE

dependent_to.name: sshfs
dependent_to.description: SSHFS allows you to mount a remote filesystem using SFTP.

dependent_to.name: py-fusepy
dependent_to.description:
Fusepy is a Python module that provides a simple interface to FUSE and
MacFUSE. It's just one file and is implemented using ctypes.
